item.title: R爬虫-代理使用
item.description: R爬虫的利器rvest，可以方便实现数据的定位与提取 添加代理需在httr下实现 直接在请求中使用代理 library(httr) ## header 使用vector类型 h <- c("Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_13_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/65.0.3325.181 Safari/537.36", "text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8", "gzip, deflate", "keep-alive") names(h) <- c("User-Agent", "Accept", "Accept-Encoding", "Connection") ## 持续获取代理 get_ips = function(){ while(TRUE){ IP_proxy = 'http://mvip.piping.mogumiao.com/proxy/api/get_ip_bs?appKey=41620212070f4853bf27fd12&count=20&expiryDate=0&format=1' ips = read_json(IP_proxy) if(ips$code == '0'){ break }else{ Sys.sleep(5) } } ips = ips[['msg']] ips = as.data.frame(do.call(rbind, ips)) ips$ip = as.character(ips$ip) ips$port = as.numeric(ips$port) return(ips) } ips = get_ips() # port ip # 1 39358 125.
